product.productDetail: Trying to decide between sporty casual and dressed-up glam? Why not do both? These adidas Stan Smith shoes have the same buttery-soft leather upper as the 1971 original, dressed up with sparkling crystals from Swarovski.

the NMD legacy in these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes. Plush Boost cushioning keeps your city adventure feeling like you are walking on clouds. And since your head is sometimes up there, it is not a bad place for your feet to be too. Great for those sunup to sundown days, the soft knit textile upper doubles down on the comfort.
